Bindings.Binding: if AtlasTWCharDB["QuickLooks"][1] then if AtlasTWFrame and AtlasTWFrame:IsVisible() then AtlasTWLootPanel_Preset1:Click() end end
if AtlasTWCharDB["QuickLooks"][2] then if AtlasTWFrame and AtlasTWFrame:IsVisible() then AtlasTWLootPanel_Preset2:Click() end end
if AtlasTWCharDB["QuickLooks"][3] then if AtlasTWFrame and AtlasTWFrame:IsVisible() then AtlasTWLootPanel_Preset3:Click() end end
if AtlasTWCharDB["QuickLooks"][4] then if AtlasTWFrame and AtlasTWFrame:IsVisible() then AtlasTWLootPanel_Preset4:Click() end end
if AtlasTWCharDB["QuickLooks"][5] then if AtlasTWFrame and AtlasTWFrame:IsVisible() then AtlasTWLootPanel_Preset5:Click() end end
if AtlasTWCharDB["QuickLooks"][6] then if AtlasTWFrame and AtlasTWFrame:IsVisible() then AtlasTWLootPanel_Preset6:Click() end end
if AtlasTWFrame and AtlasTWFrame:IsVisible() then AtlasTWLootPanel_WishList:Click() end
